data.text: @ctvwinnipeg Almost half as many Ukrainian civilians who have been killed by Russia in the past 10 days!
@ctvwinnipeg Ummmm……what will happen when the mandate ends next week. What will you report on then?
@ctvwinnipeg Cancer kills waaay more every year. That is the total from 2 WHOLE YEARS. Focus on other more important stats that matter.

@ctvwinnipeg Please stop reporting the deaths.  Not accurate at all!  My brother dropped dead of a heart attack and his autopsy report stated he had covid - he was a covid death stat which is NOT correct . Stop already.
@ctvwinnipeg Vaxecuted no one dies from omricon. They have VAIDS. Israel is minting deaths
